item.title: Emad Younis
item.description:
Blog

emadyounis.com is the personal blog of Emad Younis. It is dedicated to my views and opinions on the various areas of the datacenter while emphasizing virtualization. It also serves as a learning tool for me to document deployments, configurations, and issues Iâ€™ve encountered along the way.
